code:
stateDiagram-v2
    %% L++ State Diagram: L++ Blueprint Registry
    [FinTech_PaymentGateway] --> idle
    idle --> ready : INIT
    idle --> ready : LOAD
    ready --> ready : LOAD
    ready --> ready : REGISTER [FinTech_TransactionQueue]
    ready --> ready : UPDATE [FinTech_AuthVault]
    viewing --> viewing : UPDATE [FinTech_PaymentGateway]
    ready --> viewing : GET [FinTech_LedgerService]
    viewing --> viewing : GET
    ready --> searching : LIST [FinTech_PaymentGateway]
    ready --> searching : SEARCH [FinTech_AuthVault]
    searching --> searching : SEARCH
    searching --> viewing : SELECT [FinTech_AuthVault]
    viewing --> viewing : VERSIONS [FinTech_FraudDetection]
    viewing --> comparing : COMPARE [FinTech_TransactionQueue]
    comparing --> comparing : COMPARE
    viewing --> viewing : ROLLBACK [FinTech_TransactionQueue]
    viewing --> viewing : DEPS [FinTech_PaymentGateway]
    viewing --> viewing : CHECK_DEPS [FinTech_TransactionQueue]
    viewing --> viewing : DEPRECATE [FinTech_PaymentGateway]
    viewing --> ready : DELETE [FinTech_FraudDetection]
    ready --> ready : DELETE [FinTech_PaymentGateway]
    ready --> ready : EXPORT [FinTech_TransactionQueue]
    viewing --> viewing : EXPORT
    ready --> ready : STATS [FinTech_AuthVault]
    viewing --> ready : BACK
    searching --> ready : BACK
    comparing --> viewing : BACK
repo_description: L++ is not a programming language. It is a language-agnostic Logic Frame designed to execute business processes defined in purely symbolic, declarative blueprints.
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
